DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect dietary n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid supplementation subject ' pan CD4+ T cell function , cognition , muscle function . Half participant receive fish oil , half receive placebo ( olive oil ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Generalized inflammation consistently associate age metabolic disease , often characterize reduced muscle cognitive function . Although much aging-associated inflammation attribute chronic activation innate host defense system , activate CD4+ T cell show contribute directly pathogenesis several inflammatory disease . In human , dietary n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFA ) , particularly docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) , anti-inflammatory property reduce disease symptom , part , suppression CD4+ T cell activation . Therefore , Researchers ' overall hypothesis dietary supplementation DHA EPA human ameliorate inflammatory symptom , part , suppress CD4+ T cell activation , positively affect muscle cognitive function .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male female accord investigator/appointed staff judgment 2 . 55 year old 3 . Stable body weight past 3 month ( < 5 % change ) Exclusion criterion : 1 . History cardiovascular disease 2 . Metabolic disease , include hepatic renal disorder 3 . Presence acute illness metabolically unstable chronic illness ( include diagnosis Insulin Dependent Diabetes Mellitus ) 4 . Unwilling stop take nutritional supplement contain protein free amino acid within 5 day first study day study completion 5 . Participated nutritional supplement study program within past 4 week 6 . Any condition accord PI nurse would interfere study safety subject influence result 7 . Daily use supplement contain > 1000 mg EPA+DHA 3 month prior first test day 8 . Known hypersensitivity fish and/or shellfish , Swanson EFAs Super EPA Fish oil ingredient , Swanson EFAs Certified Organic Extra Virgin Olive oil ingredient 9 . Presence fever within last 3 day 10 . Failure give inform consent 11 . ( Possible ) Pregnancy 12 . Unwilling comply rule set forth Informed Consent Form
